definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

pinyin: Lian2 bang1 Tong1 xin4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
Zhong1 guo2 Yi2 dong4 Tong1 xin4
yi2 dong4 tong1 xin4 wang3 luo4

sentences.english: Shows how to open a port and communicate wih other computers.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序演示了打开一个端口，并和其它计算机通信。

sentences.english: It is really a nonclassical communication system.
sentences.chinese: 该系统为一非古典通信系统。

sentences.english: The dispersion influence in networks of ultrahigh -speed optical fiber communication is researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了光纤通信网中的色散及其补偿方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, the newest developing of plastic optical fiber is reviewed for various communication.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了各种通信用塑料光纤研究的最新进展。

sentences.english: The AS-I interface network layer was used to carry out the interconnection communication between sensor and executor.
sentences.chinese: 接口网络层用于传感器和执行器的联网通信。

sentences.english: All their costs, including study and living expenses, will be covered by the fund.
sentences.chinese: 包括通信费在内的大部分支出，都会由公司支付。

sentences.english: The communication between the panzer and commanding car is realized by the wireless data transmission module.
sentences.chinese: 装甲车辆与指挥车之间的通信通过无线数传模块实现。

sentences.english: The next generation of groupware tools focused on these communications problems.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的一代群件工具是以通信问题为重点的。

sentences.english: Honeycomb radio communication network, method, protocol and computer program.
sentences.chinese: 蜂窝式无线电通信网，方法，协议和计算机程序。

sentences.english: The equipment is used for communications and radar jamming, as well as radar warning.
sentences.chinese: 设备通常用于通信和雷达干扰以及雷达告警等。

sentences.english: The database partition does not share any data, but communicates via messages.
sentences.chinese: 数据库分区不会共享数据，但会通过消息进行通信。

sentences.english: He was responsible for our first system of communication based on electricity.
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的第一台电力通信系统的创造者。

sentences.english: I take charge in the pre-research in wireless transmission and some related techniques of the system.
sentences.chinese: 本人负责系统中无线通信及相关部分的前期调研工作。

sentences.english: D adviser for School of Information and Telecommunication Engineering, Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT).
sentences.chinese: 北京邮电大学信息与通信工程学院兼职博导。

sentences.english: Our radio communications have been intercepted by the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我方的无线通信被敌方窃听了。

sentences.english: Channel coding is a fundamental method to improve the communication reliability.
sentences.chinese: 信道编码是提高通信的可靠性的必要手段。
